dePaywall - Extension to remove paywall

This is a Firefox extention I made which removes paywall from any page with a single click. Install Here

Wiki for One Hundred Years of Solitude

When I read ‘One Hundred Years of Solitude’, it inspired me very much. When I looked online there wasn’t any good wiki for this novel like they have on fandom for comics and all. So, my interest in html joined hands with my idea of creating a wiki. The website is currently running here.
